TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_János_Áder, title = János_Áder, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/János_Áder} }

S.FORM: I 1959 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 3 a romi'ad masofoc ci János Áder , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Hungary anini i ci János Áder, patirengan a romi'ad i 2012 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 10 a romi'ad.

I 1959 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 3 a romi'ad masofoc ci János Áder , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Hongary anini i ci János Áder, patirengan a romi'ad i 2012 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 10 a romi'ad.
